citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1230 on 01 SEP 21.
Upon arrival at the facility I made contact with the licensee's family member. The family member stated that the licensee
was not home and was not available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1230 on 01 SEP 21. 
 
Upon arrival at the facility I made contact with the licensee's family member.  The family member stated that the licensee 
was not home and was not available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
